import React, {useState} from 'react' import './cartCheckout.scss' import useLocalStorage from '../../../hooks/useLocalStorage' const CartCheckout = () => { let items = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) || [] const [total, setTotal] = useLocalStorage(items) let totalPrice = 0 total.map(item => { totalPrice += item.productPrice }) return (

Cart totals

Subtotal

{totalPrice} $

Shipping

Free Shipping

Total

{totalPrice} $

) } export default CartCheckout
